text: @MayoClinicINFD Melioidosis is compatible with clinical data, CT and epidemiology. It's melioidosis abscess & close to hepatic vein, I would R/O mycotic aneurysm too.T marneffei is seen in immunocompromised patients.Other 2 are only seen with  pyogenic abscess or metastatic infection;less likely
